title: Requires restaurants with a seating capacity of 10 or more to provide public toilet facilities
summary: Provides that the requirement for restaurants to provide public toilet facilities shall be extended to all restaurants with a seating capacity of ten or more regardless of the date of commencement of operation as a restaurant with the exception that New York city restaurants shall be "grandfathered" under previous requirements.
